channel.title: Glacial Tooth
channel.description: Yaknow i really dont know how or why i came up with this. I had a little bit of time on my hands so i went ahead and made the first thing that came to mind.......ice......its all over the damn news...ANYWAY. If anyone wants it to use on a server and knows how to make ints and animate the thing just message me and ill provide you with a triangulated ver.

item.title: Glacial Tooth
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

^^ id be more than happy to give you the mqo for your own inspection. metaseq doesnt allow us without paying for the program, to get a render from it anymore. so i had to give you the raw model screenshot. And the size if needed to compare. would be similar to a daedric sword ^^ if that helps you at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Glacial Tooth
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Tbh i would expect 215 triangulated because its such a small weapon.

Read full topic

item.title: Glacial Tooth
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

The poly is 215 so not that bad. and i get what yall are getting at one the hilt. i already fixed that problem last night after i posted this lol ill post the updated photo when i get a chance

Read full topic

item.title: Glacial Tooth
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Personally don’t see that someone logically would be able to hold that based on how small the ring part of it is, and the weird little zig-zag above that ring. Either or, it’s an interesting little thing (assume this is for mage or something) and I like the idea. Nice job as well, from me.

Read full topic

item.title: Glacial Tooth
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

The poly is a little high on it, i can see places where you don’t need cuts or faces for anything other then shading. Also, maybe for a bit more practicality you should make the hilt a little longer so it can be held. Other then that its a great design, very different from what we’ve been seeing. Good job.

Read full topic
